Key.Original: Network Centric Warfare
Key.English: Network Centric Warfare

Key.Original: Using the advantage of the modern "Armata" combat platform, the 29th BTG of the Russian Armed Forces is storming enemy's fortified positions in the village of Adamow. Take on the role of a rifleman on the modern network-centric battlefield of the Livonian frontier.
Key.English: Using the advantage of the modern "Armata" combat platform, the 29th BTG of the Russian Armed Forces is storming enemy's fortified positions in the village of Adamow. Take on the role of a rifleman on the modern network-centric battlefield of the Livonian frontier.
Key.Russian: Используя преимущество современной боевой платформы "Армата", 29-ая БТГ ВС РФ штурмует укреплённые позиции противника в селе Адамов. Окажитесь в роли стрелка на современном сетецентрическом поле боя Ливонского театра военных действий.

Key.Original: You have successfully completed all tasks set by command and proved the effectiveness concept of network-centric warfare despite the numerical superiority of the enemy.
Key.English: You have successfully completed all tasks set by command and proved the effectiveness concept of network-centric warfare despite the numerical superiority of the enemy.
Key.Russian: Вы успешно выполнили все поставленные командованием задачи и доказали эффективность концепции ведения сетецентрической войны несмотря на численный перевес противника.

Key.Original: 3rd Mechanized platoon
Key.English: 3rd Mechanized platoon

Key.Original:
Two mechanized squads on T-15 AFV.
Call sign: Baikal-1 and Baikal-2
Key.English:
Two mechanized squads on T-15 AFV.
Call sign: Baikal-1 and Baikal-2
Key.Russian:
Два мотострелковых отделения на ББМ Т-15.
Позывной: Байкал-1 и Байкал-2

Key.Original: 2nd Tank platoon
Key.English: 2nd Tank platoon

Key.Original: 2nd Tank platoon
Key.English: 2nd Tank platoon

Key.Original:
Two crews of the T-14 MBT.
Call sign: Armavir-1 and Armavir-2
Key.English:
Two crews of the T-14 MBT.
Call sign: Armavir-1 and Armavir-2
Key.Russian:
Два экипажа ОБТ Т-14.
Позывной: Армавир-1 и Армавир-2

Key.Original:
The 29th Battalion tactical group participating in the battles for Topolin and the further offensive in this direction.
Call sign: Shatun-1
Key.English:
The 29th Battalion tactical group participating in the battles for Topolin and the further offensive in this direction.
Call sign: Shatun-1
Key.Russian:
29-ая Батальонная тактическая группа участвующая в боях за Тополин и дальнейшему наступлению по данному направлению.
Позывной: Шатун-1

Key.Original: North to Adamow
Key.English: North to Adamow

Key.Original: 29th BTG
Key.English: 29th BTG

Key.Original: 3rd Mech. Platoon
Key.English: 3rd Mech. Platoon

Key.Original: Capture the farm
Key.English: Capture the farm

Key.Original: Capture enemy's fortified positions on <marker name='mark_task1'>farm</marker> and clear out the headquarter in the administrative building.
Key.English: Capture enemy's fortified positions on <marker name='mark_task1'>farm</marker> and clear out the headquarter in the administrative building.
Key.Russian: Захватите укреплённые позиции противника на <marker name='mark_task1'>ферме</marker> и зачистите штаб в административном здании.

Key.Original: Sweep the village
Key.English: Sweep the village

Key.Original: Eliminate the guards of the MLRS battery in <marker name='mark_task2'>Adamow</marker> and take the village.
Key.English: Eliminate the guards of the MLRS battery in <marker name='mark_task2'>Adamow</marker> and take the village.
Key.Russian: Уничтожьте охрану батареи РСЗО в <marker name='mark_task2'>Адамове</marker> и займите село.

Key.Original: Destroy the mortar squad
Key.English: Destroy the mortar squad

Key.Original: The enemy is deploying mortars in the slums to the <marker name='mark_task3'>south-east</marker> of us. We need to destroy them before they open fire on the village.
Key.English: The enemy is deploying mortars in the slums to the <marker name='mark_task3'>south-east</marker> of us. We need to destroy them before they open fire on the village.
Key.Russian: Враг разворачивает минометы в трущобах к <marker name='mark_task3'>юго-востоку</marker> от нас. Необходимо их уничтожить до того как они откруют огонь по селу.

Key.Original: Situation
Key.English: Situation

Key.Original:
After taking the city Topolin the 29th Battalion Tactical Group of the AFRF can continue assault on positions of the Armed Forces of Livonia on the south side of the river, further into the country.

Two mechanized squads of the 3rd Mechanized platoon were ordered to storm fortified AFL positions in the village Adamow.

Enemy built fortifications and a field headquarter at the positions of farm north of the village Adamow. In village there is a MLRS battery firing on the city Topolin. Counter-battery fighting will lead to large destruction of civilian infrastructure, so sweeping these positions is also one of the tasks for 3rd Mech. Platoon.

The platoon is not advancing in full strength, so it will be reinforce with 2 tanks from 2nd Tank platoon. We are in the minority, but we have modern combat platforms and equipment of network-centric warfare on our side, while the enemy uses military doctrine and weapons of the Soviet Union era.
Key.English:
After taking the city Topolin the 29th Battalion Tactical Group of the AFRF can continue assault on positions of the Armed Forces of Livonia on the south side of the river, further into the country.

Two mechanized squads of the 3rd Mechanized platoon were ordered to storm fortified AFL positions in the village Adamow.

Enemy built fortifications and a field headquarter at the positions of farm north of the village Adamow. In village there is a MLRS battery firing on the city Topolin. Counter-battery fighting will lead to large destruction of civilian infrastructure, so sweeping these positions is also one of the tasks for 3rd Mech. Platoon.

The platoon is not advancing in full strength, so it will be reinforce with 2 tanks from 2nd Tank platoon. We are in the minority, but we have modern combat platforms and equipment of network-centric warfare on our side, while the enemy uses military doctrine and weapons of the Soviet Union era.
Key.Russian:
После взятия города Тополин 29-ая Батальонная тактическая группа ВС РФ может продолжать наступление на позиции Вооруженных Сил Ливонии на южной стороне реки, далее в глубь страны.

Двум мотострелковым отделениям 3-его мотострелкового взвода приказано штурмовать укреплённые позиции ВСЛ в селе Адамов.

Противник оборудовал фортификационные сооружения и полевой штаб на позициях фермы севернее села Адамов. В самом селе находятся установки РСЗО и ведут огонь по городу Тополин. Контрбатарейная борьба приведёт к большим разрушениям гражданской инфраструктуры, поэтому зачистка этих позиции так же одна из задач для 3-его МСВ.

Взвод наступает не в полном составе, поэтому в усиление ему будет придано 2 танка из 2-ого Танкового взвода. Мы в меньшинстве, но на нашей стороне современные боевые платформы и снаряжение сетецентрической войны, в то время как противник использует военную доктрину и вооружение времён Советского Союза.

Key.Original: Mission
Key.English: Mission

Key.Original: <marker name='marker_23'>3rd Mechanized platoon</marker> consisting of two mechanized squads on T-15 AFV with the support of two T-14 MBT from <marker name='marker_24'>2nd Tank platoon</marker> is storming <marker name='marker_16'>positions</marker> of the Armed Forces of Livonia from <marker name='marker_14'>north</marker>.
Key.English: <marker name='marker_23'>3rd Mechanized platoon</marker> consisting of two mechanized squads on T-15 AFV with the support of two T-14 MBT from <marker name='marker_24'>2nd Tank platoon</marker> is storming <marker name='marker_16'>positions</marker> of the Armed Forces of Livonia from <marker name='marker_14'>north</marker>.
Key.Russian: <marker name='marker_23'>3-й Мотострелковый взвод</marker> в составе 2-х мотострелковых отделений на ББМ Т-15 при поддержке 2-х танков Т-14 из <marker name='marker_24'>2-ого Танкового взвода</marker> штурмует <marker name='marker_16'>позиции</marker> Вооруженных Сил Ливонии с <marker name='marker_14'>севера</marker>.

Key.Original: Execution
Key.English: Execution

Key.Original:
1. Capture enemy fortified positions on farm.
2. Destroy the guards of the MLRS battery in the village Adamow and take it.
Key.English:
1. Capture enemy fortified positions on farm.
2. Destroy the guards of the MLRS battery in the village Adamow and take it.
Key.Russian:
1. Захватить укреплённые позиции противника на ферме.
2. Уничтожить охрану батареи РСЗО в селе Адамов и занять его.

Key.Original: Signal
Key.English: Signal

Key.Original:
Shatun-1 - 29th BTG HQ
Baikal-1 - 1th Mech. squad
Baikal-2 - 2nd Mechanized squad
Adler-1 - Т-15 AFV Crew - 1th Mech. squad
Adler-2 - Т-15 AFV Crew - 2nd Mech. squad
Armavir-1 - Т-14 MBT Crew - 2nd Tank Platoon
Armavir-2 - Т-14 MBT Crew - 2nd Tank Platoon
Key.English:
Shatun-1 - 29th BTG HQ
Baikal-1 - 1th Mech. squad
Baikal-2 - 2nd Mechanized squad
Adler-1 - Т-15 AFV Crew - 1th Mech. squad
Adler-2 - Т-15 AFV Crew - 2nd Mech. squad
Armavir-1 - Т-14 MBT Crew - 2nd Tank Platoon
Armavir-2 - Т-14 MBT Crew - 2nd Tank Platoon
Key.Russian:
Шатун-1 - Штаб 29-ой БТГ
Байкал-1 - 1-ое Мотострелковое отделение
Байкал-2 - 2-ое Мотострелковое отделение
Адлер-1 - Экипаж ББМ Т-15 - 1-ого МСО
Адлер-2 - Экипаж ББМ Т-15 - 2-ого МСО
Армавир-1 - Экипаж ОБТ Т-14 - 2-ой ТВ
Армавир-2 - Экипаж ОБТ Т-14 - 2-ой ТВ

Key.Original: Shatun-1
Key.English: Shatun-1

Key.Original: Armavir-1
Key.English: Armavir-1

Key.Original: Armavir-2
Key.English: Armavir-2

Key.Original: Adler-1
Key.English: Adler-1

Key.Original: Adler-2
Key.English: Adler-2

Key.Original: Baikal-1
Key.English: Baikal-1

Key.Original: Baikal-2
Key.English: Baikal-2

Key.Original: Squad Leader (Baikal-1-1)
Key.English: Squad Leader (Baikal-1-1)

Key.Original: Armavir-1 to Shatun-1. Lined up in battle order, proceed to the assault.
Key.English: Armavir-1 to Shatun-1. Lined up in battle order, proceed to the assault.
Key.Russian: Армавир главный - Шатуну. Выстроились в боевой порядок, приступаем к штурму.

Key.Original: Shatun-1 to Armavir-1. Acknowledge, good luck gentlemen's!
Key.English: Shatun-1 to Armavir-1. Acknowledge, good luck gentlemen's!
Key.Russian: Шатун - Армавиру главному. Принял, удачи господа!

Key.Original: Infantry, contact in 1 minute!
Key.English: Infantry, contact in 1 minute!

Key.Original: Shatun - this is Baikal-1. The farm has been seized. Proceed to the next objective.
Key.English: Shatun - this is Baikal-1. The farm has been seized. Proceed to the next objective.
Key.Russian: Шатун - это Байкал-1. Ферма захвачена. Приступаем к следующей цели.

Key.Original: Acknowledge Baikal-1. Great job. The vehicles remains in positions, you and Baikal-2 go into the village. Out.
Key.English: Acknowledge Baikal-1. Great job. The vehicles remains in positions, you and Baikal-2 go into the village. Out.
Key.Russian: Принято Байкал-1. Отличная работа. Техника остается на позициях, вы и Байкал-2 заходите в село. Конец связи.

Key.Original: Baikal-1 to Shatun-1. The village is under our control, the enemy has been destroyed, the MLRS is no longer a threat.
Key.English: Baikal-1 to Shatun-1. The village is under our control, the enemy has been destroyed, the MLRS is no longer a threat.
Key.Russian: Шатун - это Байкал-1. Село под нашим контролем, враг уничтожен, РСЗО больше не угроза.

Key.Original: Excellent Baikal-1. A new task for you. UAV spotted two vehicles and troops on the slums in the south-east of Adamow, looks like they are deploying mortars to strike at your positions. Go there and eliminate enemies before they has time to do that.
Key.English: Excellent Baikal-1. A new task for you. UAV spotted two vehicles and troops in the slums to the south-east of Adamow, looks like they are deploying mortars to strike at your positions. Go there and eliminate enemies before they has time to do that.
Key.Russian: Прекрасно Байкал-1. Для вас новая задача. БПЛА засёк два транспортных средства и пехоту в трущобах на юго-востоке от Адамова, похоже они разворачивают минометы для удара по вашим позициям. Направляйтесь туда и уничтожьте врага до того как он успеет это сделать.

Key.Original: Copy that Shatun-1. We are beginning to accomplish the task.
Key.English: Copy that Shatun-1. We are beginning to accomplish the task.
Key.Russian: Принял Шатун. Приступаем к выполнению задачи.

Key.Original: Shatun-1. The mortars were destroyed. Further directions?
Key.English: Shatun-1. The mortars were destroyed. Further directions?

Key.Original: Baikal-1. Return back to Adamow and take a hold there. Congratulations to all units! Dissmiss.
Key.English: Baikal-1. Return back to Adamow and take a hold there. Congratulations to all units! Dissmiss.
Key.Russian: Байкал-1. Возвращайтесь обратно в Адамов и закрепитесь там. Всем подразделениям, мои поздравления! Отбой.

Key.Original: Less than a minute to contact, get ready, check your gear!
Key.English: Less than a minute to contact, get ready, check your gear!
Key.Russian: До высадки меньше минуты, приготовились, проверить снаряжение!

Key.Original: Disembark! Spread the firing sectors, move forward, take cover behind the wrecks, provide suppressive fire!
Key.English: Disembark! Spread the firing sectors, move forward, take cover behind the wrecks, provide suppressive fire!
Key.Russian: Высаживаемся! Распределить огневые сектора, продвигаемся вперёд, занимаем укрытие за техникой, обеспечить подавляющий огонь!

Key.Original: Proceed to the farm, check every buildings!
Key.English: Proceed to the farm, check every buildings!
Key.Russian: Заходим на ферму, проверяем каждое здание!

Key.Original: Clear!
Key.English: Clear!
